subject: fix(quality): comprehensive code review improvements across codebase
body:
Fix metadata mismatch (index.html had "John Doe" instead of actual name),
memory leak in usePWAUpdate.ts (setInterval without cleanup), array index
React keys in 6 components, missing fetch timeout in InterestForm, and
several accessibility gaps.

Added Vitest test suite with 42 tests covering API payload validation,
email regex, browser detection, and CV data integrity. Improved API
security with explicit CORS origin rejection and stricter email validation.
Enhanced UX with error auto-dismiss, UpdatePrompt error handling, and
proper ARIA attributes. Added lint step to CI/CD pipeline.
